components.description: Tracks issues dealing with query processing.
components.name: Query Processor

fields.description:
Bucket mapjoin throws exception archiving stored hashtables. 
{noformat}
hive> set hive.optimize.bucketmapjoin = true;
hive> select /*+mapjoin(a)*/ a.key, a.value, b.value 
    > from srcbucket_mapjoin_part a join srcbucket_mapjoin_part_2 b 
    > on a.key=b.key;
Total MapReduce jobs = 1

Execution log at: /tmp/navis/navis_20120628123636_5298a863-605c-4b98-bbb3-0a132c85c5a3.log

fields.summary: FileUtils.tar does not close input files
FileUtils.tar assumes wrong directory in some cases
